SEQanswers - 生物信息学https://www.seqanswers.com/下一代测序相关生物信息学的讨论：资源、算法、开源工作等zh 2024 年 1 月 4 日星期四 10:18:20 GMT v公告60图片/misc/rss.png SEQanswers - 生物信息学https://www.seqanswers.com/ 重新审视多倍体组装程序https://www.seqanswers.com/forum/bioinformatics/bioinformatics-aa/325357-revisiting-polyploid-assemblers Thu, 04 Jan 2024 01:26:48 GMT I'm trying to assemble the de novo genome of a triploid eukaryote, w/ genome size of ca. 3.2Gbp. I've got ~50x coverage of PacBio HiFi, and also 50x...I'm trying to assemble the de novo genome of a triploid eukaryote, w/ genome size of ca. 3.2Gbp. I've got ~50x coverage of PacBio HiFi, and also 50x of Illumina HiSeq 150x150. The HiFi assembly is obviously quite redundant, with nearly all BUSCOs found in triplicate. This isn't entirely surprising -- but I haven't been able to find a way to merge these contigs into a single haploid assembly yet that doesn't require a reference. I'm not worried about phasing or reconstructing contiguous haplotypes, but rather simply a (collapsed?) representative assembly that isn't inflated by 300%. Existing tools still seem geared to unzipping diploid assemblies.

任何帮助表示赞赏！; 生物信息学k-gun12 https://www.seqanswers.com/forum/bioinformatics/bioinformatics-aa/325357-revisiting-polyploid-assemblers CITE-seq 分析教程https://www.seqanswers.com/forum/bioinformatics/bioinformatics-aa/325345-cite-seq-analysis-tutorials Sun, 24 Dec 2023 21:21:32 GMT嗨，生物信息学爱好者，我整理了 4 篇关于 CITE-seq 分析的博客文章：第 1 部分如何使用 Salmon/Alevin 预处理 CITE-seq 数据... Hi Bioinformatics lovers,

我整理了 4 篇关于 CITE-seq 分析的博客文章：

第 1 部分 如何使用 Salmon/Alevin 预处理 CITE-seq 数据《divingintogenicsandgenomics.com/post/how-to-use-salmon-alevin-to-preprocess-cite-seq-data/ 》

第 2 部分 CITE-seq 下游分析：从 Alevin 输出到 Seurat 可视化

digiintogenicsandgenomics.com/post/cite-seq-downstream-analysis-from-alevin-output-to-seurat-visualization/

第 3 部分 CITE-seq 蛋白质计数数据的中心对数比 (CLR) 归一化 into Geneticsandgenomics.com/post/details-in-centered-log-ratio-clr-normalization-for-cite-seq- Protein-count-data/

第 4 部分 使用带有 dsb 包的空液滴进行 CITE-seq 标准化divivingintogenicsandgenomics.com/post/part-4-cite-seq-normalization-using-empty-droplets-with-the-dsb-package/

快乐学习！
汤米
​; 生物信息学疯狂的热汤米https://www.seqanswers.com/forum/bioinformatics/bioinformatics-aa/325345-cite-seq-analysis-tutorials BWA-MEM2 中的对齐分数计算https://www.seqanswers.com/forum/bioinformatics/bioinformatics-aa/325330-alignement-score-calculation-in-bwa-mem2 Wed, 20 Dec 2023 12:38:07 GMT大家好，有谁知道 BWA-MEM2 中的读取质量是如何过滤的？确切的公式是什么？如何过滤读数？我猜是... Hi everyone,

有谁知道 BWA-MEM2 中的读取质量如何过滤？确切的公式是什么？如何过滤读数？我猜这个公式就是这样的：
匹配*分数 + 不匹配*分数 + 差距*分数
但我还无法证实这一点。我想某处有文档，但我不知道它在哪里......

感谢您的帮助。​​; 生物信息学波莉https://www.seqanswers.com/forum/bioinformatics/bioinformatics-aa/325330-alignement-score-calculation-in-bwa-mem2 The reads I see on IGV doesn't match the counts I have. https://www.seqanswers.com/forum/bioinformatics/bioinformatics-aa/325328-the-reads-i-see-on-igv-doesn-t-match-the-counts-i-have Tue, 19 Dec 2023 23:58:53 GMT我使用 kallistogenomebam 对搁浅的单端和双端数据进行伪对齐并生成 bam 文件。我将我的 bam 文件可视化... I used kallisto genomebam to perform pseudoalignment on stranded single-end and paired-end data and generated bam files. I visualized my bam files on IGV and compared them to the counts I got from kallisto/tximport and they don't match up. Sometimes my count would say 0 but I see reads on IGV or it says there are thousands of reads but I don't see anything on IGV. Has anyone else encountered this issue and resolved it? Also what does the direction of the reads indicate? I have reads that go in the same and opposite direction as my genes. Also, for my stranded paired-end data, why do I have LR and RL reads? I was reading that RL means duplication or translocation; is that always the explanation? 生物信息学耶玛https://www.seqanswers.com/forum/bioinformatics/bioinformatics-aa/325328-the-reads-i-see-on-igv-doesn-t-match-the-counts-i-have 教程 基因组学和转录组学的七个基本生物信息学工具https://www.seqanswers.com/forum/bioinformatics/bioinformatics-aa/325287-tutorial-7-essential-bioinformatics-tools-for-genomics-and-transcriptomics Sun, 10 Dec 2023 18:28:48 GMT嗨，生物信息学爱好者，基因组学和转录组学的七个基本生物信息学工具 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=URYuMLLWfVA ...
